text: Goran Petković (Serbian Cyrillic: Горан Петковић ;born 5 March 1975 in Belgrade) is a retired Serbian professional football midfielder. His previous clubs include FK Zemun, Greeks Kallithea FC and Agios Dimitrios FC, and FK BASK Beograd Petković, with Kallithea F.C. played in the Greek Super League. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at Srbijafudbal. title: Goran Petković
